name: Joshua Stipancic Prototypes
description:
For Experimental Game Design (9750)

Prototype 1 Processing Sword Art:

Able to write/draw on screen

Will change colour  with each movement and fade

Refresh on each new click

Prototype 2 Grav A Square:

Box will fall downwards when clicked the gravity will change making the player go up or down

The player must click to change gravity to stop the box from running into obstacles

Score will be based on time survived

Prototype 3 Revenge Time Racer:

Player will control a box

They must run away from other player box for 10 seconds if caught they will be destroyed 

If they survive the time limit they can get revenge and race against the 10 seconds they have to destroy the opponent 

If nobody destroys each other on their first turn then the speed of chaser will increase

Prototype 4 Slime Shouter:

User has to speak into the microphone to make the player jump over obstacle and

traps to finish the level

The speed of player will increase and result in player needing to speak more often

Nice art style

The longer they speak the longer the slime will remain in the air
